<small>Aramaic form: **<big>[[H7127|קְרֵב]]</big>**</small>
 I. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קָרֵב‎</span>], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קָרַב‎</span><sub>279</sub> **verb** ==come near, approach== (Late Hebrew ***approach, be offered***; Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***‡arâbu***</u></abbr>, ***approach***; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***be near, approach***; so Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">: Sabean <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קרב‎</span> ***approach*** a woman (sexually, see **1 a** below), [[BDB#DHM|DHM]]<sup>Hofmus. No.6.1.2.</sup>, but also generally <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎דֿ רחק וקרב‎</span> ***he who is far and he who is near*** [[BDB#CIS|CIS]]<sup>iv, no. 95, 7, 8</sup> compare SabDenkm<sup>No. 12, 9, 10</sup>; Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎קְרֵב‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, ***approach***; also, = ***oblation***, Sabean <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קרבן‎</span> [[BDB#DHM|DHM]]<sup>ZMG xxx (1876), 672</sup> Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, O Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎קרבו‎</span>, [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קוּרְבָּנָא‎</span>, Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; compare Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***kurbannu***</u></abbr> (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כ‎</span>), DI<sup>HWS 351</sup>); — 

**Qal**<sub>93</sub> ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ק‎</span> [[Gen.20.4|Gen 20:4]] +; 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קָרֵ֑בָה‎</span> [[Zeph.3.2|Zeph 3:2]], etc.; ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִקְרַב‎</span> [[Gen.37.18|Gen 37:18]] + etc.; ***Imperative*** masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קְרַב‎</span> [[2Sam.20.16|2Sam 20:16]] +, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎דָמק֫רְבָה‎</span> [[Ps.69.19|Ps 69:19]] masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קִרְבוּ‎</span> [[Exod.16.9|Exod 16:9]] ***infinitive absolute*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קָרוֺב‎</span> [[Eccl.4.17|Eccl 4:17]] [[BDB#De|De]] [[BDB#Siegf|Siegf]] [[BDB#Ol|Ol]]<sup>§ 249 c</sup> [[BDB#Sta|Sta]]<sup>§ 642 c</sup> [[BDB#Kö|Kö]]<sup>i. 175</sup>; ***construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קְרֹב‎</span> [[Ps.27.2|Ps 27:2]]; [[Ps.32.9|Ps 32:9]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְקָרְבָה‎</span> [[Exod.36.2|Exod 36:2]], etc.; — ***approach:*** 

**1. a.** with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶל‎</span> person (27 t.) [[Gen.37.18|Gen 37:18]]; [[Num.18.4|Num 18:4]]; [[Mal.3.5|Mal 3:5]] (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְמִּשְׁפָּט‎</span>), [[Jonah.1.6|Jonah 1:6]] +; in kindness [[1Kgs.2.7|1Kgs 2:7]], of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> to help [[Ps.69.19|Ps 69:19]] for war, battle, [[Exod.14.20|Exod 14:20]]; [[Judg.20.24|Judg 20:24]] unto God [[1Sam.14.36|1Sam 14:36]] (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֲלוֺם‎</span>), [[Zeph.3.2|Zeph 3:2]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> [[Ezek.44.15|Ezek 44:15]]; [[Isa.48.16|Isa 48:16]] ***approach*** sexually, of man, [[Gen.20.4|Gen 20:4]]; [[Isa.8.3|Isa 8:3]]; [[Deut.22.14|Deut 22:14]]; [[Lev.18.6|Lev 18:6]]; [[Lev.18.14|Lev 18:14]]; [[Lev.18.19|Lev 18:19]] ([[BDB#H|H]]) [[Ezek.18.6|Ezek 18:6]] of woman [[Lev.20.16|Lev 20:16]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶל‎</span> of beast); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֵלֶיךָ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ק‎</span> [[Isa.65.5|Isa 65:5]] = ***keep to thyself*** (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַלתִּֿגַּשׁבּֿי‎</span>); with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span> person, in hostility, [[Ps.27.2|Ps 27:2]] (+ infinitive purpose), so probably <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִקְּרָבלִֿי‎</span> [[Ps.55.19|Ps 55:19]] ***that none may approach me*** (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ק‎</span> infinitive construct, so [[BDB#Che|Che]] [[BDB#Bae|Bae]] [[BDB#Dr|Dr]], &gt; noun = ***battle***). 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶל‎</span> location [[Exod.32.19|Exod 32:19]]; [[Deut.2.37|Deut 2:37]]; [[Deut.20.10|Deut 20:10]] Joshua; [[Prov.5.8|Prov 5:8]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶל‎</span> of thing [[Josh.3.3|Josh 3:3]]; [[Ezek.42.14|Ezek 42:14]]; [[Ezek.44.16|Ezek 44:16]]; [[Lev.22.3|Lev 22:3]] ([[BDB#H|H]]), [[Exod.36.2|Exod 36:2]] + 5 t. [[BDB#P|P]]; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַלהַֿמִּזְבֵּחַ‎</span> [[2Kgs.16.12|2Kgs 16:12]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶלהַֿמִּלְחָמָה‎</span> [[Deut.20.2|Deut 20:2]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **c.** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לִפְנֵי‎</span> person (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>) [[Exod.16.9|Exod 16:9]]; [[Lev.16.1|Lev 16:1]]; [[Ps.119.169|Ps 119:169]] (of cry); before men [[Num.9.6|Num 9:6]]; [[Josh.17.4|Josh 17:4]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **d.** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מוּל‎</span> of a people [[Deut.2.19|Deut 2:19]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **e.** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ב‎</span> location [[Judg.19.13|Judg 19:13]]; [[Ps.91.10|Ps 91:10]] (of evil). **feminine** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span> location [[Job.33.22|Job 33:22]] adverb of location <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֲלֹם‎</span> [[Exod.3.5|Exod 3:5]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֵ֫נָּה‎</span> [[Isa.57.3|Isa 57:3]] (compare **g**, [[2Sam.20.16|2Sam 20:16]]). 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **g.** ***draw near*** for a purpose, with Infinitive [[1Sam.17.48|1Sam 17:48]]; [[2Sam.15.5|2Sam 15:5]]; [[Deut.25.11|Deut 25:11]]; [[Exod.12.48|Exod 12:48]]; [[Lev.21.17|Lev 21:17]]; [[Num.17.5|Num 17:5]]; [[Isa.34.1|Isa 34:1]]; [[Eccl.4.17|Eccl 4:17]], + (Infinitive omitted) [[Lev.21.18|Lev 21:18]] with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וֵ‎</span> subordinate [[2Sam.20.16|2Sam 20:16]] (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַדהֵֿ֫נָּה‎</span>); with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לַמִּשְׁפָּט‎</span> [[Isa.41.1|Isa 41:1]] (compare 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **a.** [[Mal.3.5|Mal 3:5]]); + Imperative [[Deut.5.24|Deut 5:24]]; [[Josh.10.24|Josh 10:24]]; [[Lev.10.4|Lev 10:4]], + Imperfect [[Josh.10.24|Josh 10:24]]; [[Lev.10.5|Lev 10:5]] 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **h.** absolute (15 t.) [[Josh.7.14|Josh 7:14]] (3 t. in verse) (technically of approach to sanctuary, for trial by lot), [[Isa.5.19|Isa 5:19]] (of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>'s counsel), [[Isa.41.5|Isa 41:5]] +, [[Lam.3.57|Lam 3:57]] (of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>, to help); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַמִּלְחָמָה‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַחִק‎</span> [[1Kgs.20.29|1Kgs 20:29]] i.e. the battle was joined; of calamities [[Ezek.9.1|Ezek 9:1]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קִצֵּנוּ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ק‎</span> [[Lam.4.18|Lam 4:18]]. 

**2.** of time, ***draw near***, [[Gen.27.41|Gen 27:41]]; [[Deut.15.9|Deut 15:9]]; [[Ezek.12.23|Ezek 12:23]] specifically <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לָמות‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְמֵי פ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ק‎</span> [[Gen.47.27|Gen 47:27]]; [[Deut.31.14|Deut 31:14]]; [[1Kgs.2.1|1Kgs 2:1]] **Niph\`al** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular consecutive <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְנִקְרַב אֶלהָֿאֱםהִים‎</span> [[Exod.22.7|Exod 22:7]] ***he shall be brought unto God*** (at the sanctuary), also (absolute, reflexive) 2 masculine plural consecutive <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צְנִקְרַבְתֶּם‎</span> [[Josh.7.14|Josh 7:14]] (compare **Qal h**). **Pi\`el** ***Perfect*** 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קֵרַכְתִּי‎</span> [[Isa.46.13|Isa 46:13]] 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קֵרְבוּ‎</span> [[Hos.7.6|Hos 7:6]] (see below), [[Ezek.36.8|Ezek 36:8]] ***imperfect*** 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וּתְקָרֵב‎</span> [[Ps.65.5|Ps 65:5]] 1 singular suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֲקָֽרְבֶנּוּ‎</span> [[Job.31.37|Job 31:37]] ***Imperative*** masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קָרַב‎</span> [[Ezek.37.17|Ezek 37:17]] masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קָֽרְבוּ‎</span> [[Isa.41.21|Isa 41:21]] — ***cause to approach, bring near:*** 

**1.** in space, accusative of thing + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶל‎</span> [[Ezek.37.17|Ezek 37:17]] = ***receive***, accusative of person [[Job.31.37|Job 31:37]] ([[BDB#Thes|Thes]] [[BDB#Du|Du]]; most ***approach majestically, march up to***), accusative omitted [[Ps.65.5|Ps 65:5]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רִיבְכֶם‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ק‎</span> [[Isa.41.21|Isa 41:21]] ***bring on your suit !*** 

**2.** in time, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צִדְקָתִ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ק‎</span> [[Isa.46.13|Isa 46:13]] (of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לָבוֺא‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ק‎</span> [[Ezek.36.8|Ezek 36:8]] ***they have brought near to come, brought their coming near***, it is at hand (compare **Hiph\`il** [[Gen.12.11|Gen 12:11]]). — [[Hos.7.6|Hos 7:6]] read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בָּעַר‎</span> for <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קֵרְבוּ‎</span> (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קִרְבּוֺ‎</span> [[BDB#RS|RS]]<sup>Proph. iv, N.19</sup>), compare [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] [[BDB#Now|Now]]. **Hiph\`il**<sub>177</sub> ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִקְרִיב‎</span> [[Gen.12.11|Gen 12:11]] +, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רִב‎</span>- [[Num.7.19|Num 7:19]] 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְהִקְרַבְ֫תָּ‎</span> [[Exod.29.3|Exod 29:3]] +, etc.: ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַקְרִיב‎</span> [[Ezek.44.27|Ezek 44:27]] +, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רִב‎</span>- [[Ezek.46.4|Ezek 46:4]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיַקְרֵב‎</span> [[Judg.3.17|Judg 3:17]] +; plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַנַּקְרֵב‎</span> [[Num.31.50|Num 31:50]]. etc.; ***Imperative*** masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַקְרֵב‎</span> [[Num.3.6|Num 3:6]] +, etc.; ***Infinitive absolute*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֵקְרֵב‎</span> [[Lev.6.7|Lev 6:7]] construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַקְרִיב‎</span> [[Judg.3.18|Judg 3:18]] +, etc.; ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַקְרִיב‎</span> [[Lev.3.1|Lev 3:1]] +, etc.; — 

**1. a.** ***bring near, bring, present***, with accusative of thing, [[Judg.5.25|Judg 5:25]] (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּסֵפֶל‎</span>), compare [[Exod.29.3|Exod 29:3]] (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בַּסָּל‎</span>); tribute [[Ps.72.10|Ps 72:10]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִנְחָה‎</span> [[Judg.3.17|Judg 3:17]] (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span> person), v[[Judg.3.18|Judg 3:18]] compare (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span> person) [[Mal.1.8|Mal 1:8]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׂדֶה בְּשָׂדֶה יַק‎</span> [[Isa.5.8|Isa 5:8]] i.e. ***join, incorporate***; pregnantly with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span> local [[2Kgs.16.14|2Kgs 16:14]] (see [[BDB#RS|RS]]<sup>Semitic i. 466 ff., 2nd ed. 486 ff.</sup>); accusative of case, affair, [[Deut.1.17|Deut 1:17]] (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶל‎</span> person), [[Num.27.5|Num 27:5]] (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לִפְנֵי י‎</span>); with accusative of person: + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶל‎</span> person), [[Num.15.33|Num 15:33]]; [[Num.25.6|Num 25:6]]; [[Josh.8.23|Josh 8:23]], + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶל‎</span> reflexive [[Exod.28.1|Exod 28:1]], + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶת‎</span> (perp.) reflexive [[Num.18.2|Num 18:2]] absolute of person, ***make an appraoch*** [[Exod.14.10|Exod 14:10]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** of time, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִקְרִיב לָבוֺא‎</span> [[Gen.12.11|Gen 12:11]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּקְרִיב לָלֶדֶת‎</span> [[Isa.26.17|Isa 26:17]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַתַּקְרִיבִי‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָמַיִךְ‎</span> [[Ezek.22.4|Ezek 22:4]]. 

**2.** as technical term (c.158 t.) chiefly in Ezekiel [[BDB#HPS|HPS]], ***bring near***, of presenting, dedicating, or offering to <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׃י‎</span> 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **a.** with accusative of person, (I) Araron and his sons, and Levites, sometimes with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶל‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְפְנֵי‎</span>, person or location, [[Exod.29.4|Exod 29:4]]; [[Exod.29.8|Exod 29:8]]; [[Exod.40.12|Exod 40:12]]; [[Exod.40.14|Exod 40:14]]; [[Lev.3.6|Lev 3:6]]; [[Lev.7.35|Lev 7:35]]; [[Lev.8.6|Lev 8:6]]; [[Lev.8.13|Lev 8:13]]; [[Lev.8.24|Lev 8:24]]; [[Num.8.9|Num 8:9]]; [[Num.8.10|Num 8:10]]; [[Num.16.5|Num 16:5]] (twice in verse); [[Num.16.9|Num 16:9]]; [[Num.16.10|Num 16:10]], compare (of princ, subj,. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>) [[Jer.30.21|Jer 30:21]] (2) for selection by [[Josh.7.16|Josh 7:16]]; [[Josh.7.17|Josh 7:17]] (twice in verse); [[Josh.7.18|Josh 7:18]]; [[1Sam.10.20|1Sam 10:20]]; [[1Sam.10.21|1Sam 10:21]] (3) for ordeal of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵי הַמָּרִים‎</span> [[Num.5.16|Num 5:16]], 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** usually (c. 142 t.) with accusative off offering, with or without further complement (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶל‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לִפְנֵי‎</span> location <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לי‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לִפְנֵי י‎</span>; rarely <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶל‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span> of priest, etc.): (1) animal-offering [[Lev.3.7|Lev 3:7]]; [[Lev.3.12|Lev 3:12]]; [[Lev.8.18|Lev 8:18]]; [[Lev.8.22|Lev 8:22]] (all + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סָמִךְ‎</span> of offerer), [[Exod.29.10|Exod 29:10]]; [[Lev.1.15|Lev 1:15]]; [[Lev.4.3|Lev 4:3]]; [[Lev.4.14|Lev 4:14]] +, etc. (2) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צֶבַךְ‎</span> [[Lev.7.16|Lev 7:16]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֹלָה‎</span> [[Num.29.13|Num 29:13]]; [[Num.29.36|Num 29:36]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אִשֶּׁה‎</span> [[Lev.3.3|Lev 3:3]]; [[Lev.3.14|Lev 3:14]]; [[Lev.23.8|Lev 23:8]]; [[Lev.23.25|Lev 23:25]] +; (3) blood [[Lev.1.5|Lev 1:5]] (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎זָרַק‎</span>), [[Lev.7.33|Lev 7:33]]; [[Lev.9.9|Lev 9:9]] (4) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִנְחָה‎</span> [[Lev.2.8|Lev 2:8]]; [[Lev.6.7|Lev 6:7]]; [[Lev.7.12|Lev 7:12]]; [[Lev.23.16|Lev 23:16]];  [[Lev.6.16|Lev 6:16]]; [[Lev.15.9|Lev 15:9]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לֶחֶם אֱלֹהָיו‎</span> [[Lev.21.6|Lev 21:6]]; [[Lev.21.8|Lev 21:8]]; [[Lev.21.17|Lev 21:17]]; [[Lev.21.21|Lev 21:21]], etc.;(5) incense [[Num.16.35|Num 16:35]] censer v[[Num.16.17|Num 16:17]]; [[Num.17.3|Num 17:3]]; [[Num.17.4|Num 17:4]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֵשׁ זָרָה‎</span> [[Lev.10.1|Lev 10:1]]; [[Num.3.4|Num 3:4]]; [[Num.26.61|Num 26:61]] (6) especially with accusative of congnate meaning with verb <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קָרְבָּן‎</span> [[Lev.1.2|Lev 1:2]] (twice in verse); [[Lev.1.14|Lev 1:14]]; [[Lev.2.1|Lev 2:1]]; [[Lev.2.4|Lev 2:4]]; [[Lev.22.18|Lev 22:18]]; [[Num.7.10|Num 7:10]]; [[Num.7.11|Num 7:11]]; [[Num.31.50|Num 31:50]] + (c.33 t.); (7) accusative om, [[2Chr.35.12|2Chr 35:12]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **c.** ***make an offering*** [[Num.7.2|Num 7:2]]; [[Num.7.18|Num 7:18]].
